3.title: Hidden Diaries - part 1
3.update: As promised, I am going to upload the first piece. I had been writing this piece while in campus, but you don't need all the dirt. Basically, the story behind this is that I lost a substancial amount of data from my hard drive, including some pieces I had written before. So, thats how this one was born. I walk around with the entire plot line up in my head, so I should probably finish it. Enjoy
